name: Mankind’s Precious · The Pirate Bay
description: User styles for The Pirate Bay (HTTP and HTTPS; all top level domains). The styles retain the original branding and feel, but advertisements are hidden and the UI somewhat cleaner. For example, on torrent detail pages, the only download link is the magnet link. You can still download torrent files from the search results, but I recommend using Magnet. The screenshot also shows the Mankind’s Precious user styles for Firefox (Nightly, with Australis interface).
additional_info: Release Notes Version 0.1.1 · Increased font size for seeders and leechers on search result hover. · Fixed regular expression for optional HTTPS protocol in URL. · Fixed version number. Version 0.1.0 · Initial release, obviously. Available on GitHub https://github.com/dnordstrom/userstyles.thepiratebay
